Package net.finmath.montecarlo.process

Class AbstractLogNormalProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.finmath.montecarlo.process.AbstractLogNormalProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonteCarloProcess, Process
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogNormalProcessEulerScheme, LogNormalProcessEulerSchemeWithBarrier, LogNormalProcessEulerSchemeWithFactorDrift
    public abstract class AbstractLogNormalProcess
extends Object
implements MonteCarloProcess
    This class is an abstract base class to implement a multi-dimensional multi-factor log-normal Ito process. The dimension is called numberOfComponents here. The default for numberOfFactors is 1. Manages the time discretization and delegation to model.
    Since:
    finmath-lib 4.1.0
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Christian Fries

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public abstract AbstractLogNormalProcess clone()
        Description copied from interface: MonteCarloProcess
        Create and return a clone of this process. The clone is not tied to any model, but has the same process specification, that is, if the model is the same, it would generate the same paths.
        Specified by:
        clone in interface MonteCarloProcess
        Specified by:
        clone in interface Process
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object
        Returns:
        Clone of the process

        public abstract RandomVariable getMonteCarloWeights​(int timeIndex)

        Specified by:
        getMonteCarloWeights in interface Process

        Returns:
